document_data.name: Mamood Kalin
document_data.mainbody: '''Mamood Kalin''' was a member of the [[Riders of Blood]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.History: Originally from [[Huzuz]], Mamood's father was accused as being a traitor to the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]] and beheaded. Mamood carried hatred for the Grand Caliph and his misuse of justice since the day of his father's execution.
document_data.Activities: Mamood used his magical abilities on raids against caravans traveling along [[Dihl al-Taif]]. He delighted in slaying as many living targets as possible, a behavior that often riled [[Fasim Kaldur]] who believed the animals should be left alive for use or resale.
